accomodation.georgia-caption: Discover villa Georgia, a charming 45m² retreat for 4 guests near the sea.
accomodation.dimitra-caption: Experience luxury at villa Dimitra, a gorgeous 85m² retreat for 5 guests.

Introdution.title: Experience the epitome of luxury living
Introdution.message: Mocca Living embodies the essence of luxury living in one of Greece's most stunning coastal settings. Located in Agia Paraskevi, near the shores of Kyani Akti beach, Mocca Living offers an unparalleled experience for those who appreciate the finer things in life. Each detail, from the elegant design to the high-end amenities, has been carefully considered to provide guests with a sanctuary of comfort and style. Just a short stroll away, the renowned <nama>Nãma Beach Life Experience</nama> enhances the luxurious lifestyle, offering exquisite dining options that complement the serene beauty of the area. Whether you're here for a brief stay or an extended retreat, Mocca Living promises an experience that blends sophistication with the natural splendor of its surroundings.

reason1.title: Families
reason1.description: Mocca Living offers spacious, comfortable accommodations, perfect for families seeking quality time together by the sea, with amenities designed for all ages.

reason2.title: Friends
reason2.description: Gather your friends for a luxurious getaway at Mocca Living, where shared moments and unforgettable memories are made in an idyllic coastal setting.

reason3.title: VIP Guests
reason3.description: Experience exclusive luxury and personalized services at Mocca Living, the ideal destination for VIP guests who demand privacy, comfort, and elegance.

reason4.title: Honeymooners
reason4.description: Celebrate your love at Mocca Living, a romantic haven where honeymooners can enjoy intimate moments in a serene and luxurious beachfront environment.

reason5.title: Wellness Retreats
reason5.description: Mocca Living is the perfect haven for wellness lovers, offering a peaceful environment ideal for relaxation and slow-living by the sea.

Introdution.title: Our Exclusive Villas
Introdution.message: Experience ultimate luxury at Mocca Living, where our exclusive villas perfectly blend modern comfort with timeless elegance. Each villa is carefully designed to offer an unforgettable stay, whether you're here for a family vacation, a getaway with friends, or a romantic retreat. Indulge in luxury and discover the perfect balance between relaxation and refined aesthetics in a space that promises to make every moment unique.

dimitra.title: Dimitra
dimitra.description: Embrace the luxury of space in Villa Dimitra, an 85m² sanctuary for 5 adults and 1 child. With 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, it's ideal for a relaxed, elegant stay.

georgia.title: Georgia
georgia.description: Step into Villa Georgia, a charming 45m² haven for 4 adults and 1 child. Featuring 2 bedrooms and a modern bathroom, it's the perfect cozy escape near the sea.

georgia.name: Georgia
georgia.layout: One main entrance, Big living room area, Dining room area, Two master bedrooms with double-sized beds, One shared bathroom, Direct access to big private outdoor area

amenities.indoor: Free Wi-Fi, One 55" Smart TV, One ceiling fan, Fully provisioned smart-equipped kitchen, Electric oven, Kitchen extractor hood, Fridge, Clothes washer, Clothes iron & ironing board, Nespresso machine, Sound system Marshall, Safe box
amenities.outdoor: Private area with pergola, Sunbeds with umbrella, Sitting area, Mini pool with hydromassage & color-therapy, Private garden with tropical plants and flowers, Shower area

georgia.request: Two SUP boards for rental, One electric-bike for rental

dimitra.name: Dimitra
dimitra.layout: One main entrance, Big living room area, Dining room area, One master bedroom with king-sized bed (COCOMAT mattress and bed cover) and en-suite bathroom, One bedroom with queen-sized bed (COCOMAT mattress and bed cover) and en-suite bathroom, Direct access to big private outdoor area

amenities.indoor: Free Wi-Fi, Three 55" Smart TV, Three ceiling fans, Kitchen, Kitchen extractor hood, Air fryer, Fridge, Clothes washer, Clothes iron & ironing board, Nespresso machine, Sound system (Marshall Acton III), Safe box
amenities.outdoor: Private area with two pergolas and two sitting areas, Sunbeds with umbrella, Mini pool with hydromassage & color-therapy, Private garden with tropical plants and flowers, Shower area

dimitra.request: Two SUP boards for rental, One electric-bike for rental

Privacy.title: General terms
Privacy.content: Our website mocca-living.gr safeguards the personal nature of your information and cannot disclose it to any third party (natural or legal entity) for any reason, except for relevant legal provisions and solely to the competent authorities. We reserve the right to disclose your personally identifiable information as required by law and when we believe that disclosure is necessary to protect our rights and/or comply with a judicial proceeding, court order, or legal process served on our website. Our website mocca-living.gr keeps records of personal information that visitors exclusively submit for communication purposes. Visitors can contact the appropriate department to verify the existence of their personal file, correct it, change it, or delete it. Visitors or users of our website mocca-living.gr who are minors have access to its services only with the consent of their parents or guardians and are not obliged to submit their personal information. In case such information is submitted by minors and if the fact becomes known to us, our company deletes all related information. Our business, particularly the marketing department, may process part or all of the information you have submitted for statistical and improvement purposes of the provided services and information. As our business continues to evolve by introducing new products, our Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time. We will only use your personal information in accordance with the Privacy Policy in effect at the time we collected your personal information.
Privacy.sub-content: The visitor of the pages and services of our website mocca-living.gr grants their consent to the above terms of use, which apply to the entirety of the content, pages, graphics, images, photographs, and files included on the website. Therefore, they should carefully read these terms before visiting or using the pages and services of the mocca-living.gr website. If they do not agree, they should refrain from using the services and content of the website. The visitor is requested to check the content of these pages for any possible changes. The continued use of the mocca-living.gr website, even after any changes, signifies the visitor's unconditional acceptance of these terms.

content-1.description: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help websites function properly, enhance user experience, and provide analytical insights. Cookies can be categorized into different types based on their purpose:
content-1.bullet-1: Essential Cookies - Required for the website to function properly.
content-1.bullet-2: Performance Cookies - Help analyze how visitors use the website to improve its functionality.
content-1.bullet-3: Functional Cookies - Enhance user experience by remembering preferences (e.g., language settings).
content-1.bullet-4: Marketing Cookies - Used for advertising and tracking user behavior across different websites.

content-2.bullet-1: CONSENT_COOKIE - This cookie is stored to deliver a better user experience and analyze website traffic.
content-2.bullet-2: NEXT_LOCALE - This cookie is used for internalization purposes, ensuring the website displays the correct language based on user preferences.

CookieConsent.title: Cookies
CookieConsent.message: This site uses services that use cookies to deliver a better user experience and analyze traffic. You can learn more about the services we use at our privacy policy page.
